author: Zanidom
install_msg: Thanks for installing Zan's Bounties cog! Use /bountyconfig to configure audit/board channels and bounty creation cost. Then sync slash commands per RedBot's guidance.
name: Bounties
short: Buyer-driven bounty board with escrow payouts.
description: Adds /bounty commands to create, browse, and fulfil bounties on a per-server basis.
end_user_data_statement: This cog stores bounty data per server: titles/descriptions/rewards, user IDs of posters/applicants/accepted users, and optional message IDs for the bounty board.
